titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

p.hi: Chapter consumed the morning. Everybody was amicable. We appointed Henderson to the living of Berwick–on–Tweed: and made Hughes acting–Sacrist.
Old Sir Peile Thompson arrived at lunch–time. Ella took him over to Bishop Auckland in the car, & I attended Evensong.
We had tea with the Shaftoes at 9 South Bailey.
